attributes.action: Cap domestic council tax under £1500.00 for houses up to £250000.
attributes.additional_details: The expenses for every thing [ petrol, diesel, gas, groceries etc.] is increased by 150% in last 2-3 months and the salary of working class people is same and people who work for nhs and all other civil departments never got a salary increment  as per the expenses every day. By capping the the council tax to £1500.00 for the household worth £250000.00,  the working class people will have a great relief in there monthly expenses.
attributes.background: Working  class is under pressure to pay off the huge council tax every year. It is increasing every year by at least 10%.The government need to stop increasing council tax for the domestic households and keep it under £1500.00 for citizens who is buying the house up to £250000.00.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want council tax to be capped for certain properties, but we're not sure if you want this to be capped based on the 1991 values used to set council tax bands, or based on the most recent purchase value, or current valuation of a property. It's also not clear if you want council tax of over £1,500 per annum to be able to be charged for properties worth under £250,000.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
